subject: United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Brian Gay shot a second consecutive 66 to keep the lead after the third round at the T.P.C. Southwind. A victory will earn Gay a place in the United States Open which begins Thursday.
snippet: Brian Gay shot a second consecutive 66 to keep the lead after the third round at the T.P.C. Southwind. A victory will earn Gay a place in the United States Open which begins Thursday.
